# pychron â±ï¸

**pychron** is a simple command-line tool that shows the execution time of your Python scripts in real time.

It prints the **elapsed time while the script is running**, and shows a clean **summary** when the script finishes.

---

## âœ¨ Features

- âœ… Shows elapsed time in real time (live timer)
- âœ… Does not break or hide your script output (`stdout`)
- âœ… Prints **start time**, **finish time**, and **total time**
- âœ… Colorful and terminal-friendly ANSI output
- âœ… Very lightweight and easy to use

---

## ğŸ“¦ Installation

Install using pip:

```bash
pip3.12 install pychron
```

```bash

pychron main.py


```
